Reviews.Title: “A great home-base for people looking to save on a hotel, and splurge on the things to do”
Reviews.Author: lissy_123
Reviews.Content: you’re looking stay 5 star resort playa del carmen stay la typical tourist trap welcoming establishment air staying laidback relatives owners thed pia ensure pleasant stay arriving husband little distraught – bus airport accident leaving own route accident hotel thed immediately care brought complimentary beers upgraded reservation suite 2 balconies kitchen stove traditional mexican stove – didn’t fridge microwave nice throughout weeklong stay thed friend staying hotel offered countless suggestions eat means doing cheaper thed called favorite restaurant tango taco stay phone – exhausted appreciated thed check day we’d adventures standard reading corner travelers welcome borrow books – definitely appreciated day 3 note 3 cockroach encounters sadly 2 20 minutes little fragile travelling fun start you’re expect reviews mention noise – aren’t kidding listened terrible conflicting mexican techno night warned music late 200am somewhat prepared reality died music actually 700am 15 minute break morning mix started week exhausted briefly considered taking “if can’t beat join approach couldn’t excursions booked start times days simple solution bring earplugs past reviewers complained hardness beds ive stayed mexico 3 times past found time beds dont thats fair complaint la property major strip 10 calle 5th 10th beach lots beach rent lawn chair park day found alhambra price 850 day drinks cost 15 day obligated drink added lot recommendations trip playa del carmen eat la parrilla 5th heading towards tacos special tango taco 10th calle heading west towards walmart steak 2 restaurants definitely favorite cheapest book excursions chichen itza xelha incredible tulum nice crowded paid cab tulum day paid entrance fee avoid massive crowds trip earplugs drastically improved experience consider necessity return trip la

Reviews.Title: “¡Me gusta La Rana!”
Reviews.Author: PlayaLili
Reviews.Content: husband visited playa del carmen times ten it’s fascinating watch transformation quaint fishing town haven vibrant travel destination attracting diverse international visitors we’ve returned recent visit stayed la enjoyed previous trip hotel’s owners pia thed warm gracious hosts staff consistently friendly helpful love festive vibe bar la feel honorary community expats locals getaway “home home” … food fest coming november sounds pretty compelling ☺ lili greg ps previous reviewer noted manager jorge stellar

Reviews.Title: “La Rana Cansada Always my choice!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jshawnhh
Reviews.Content: traveled playa del carmen times past ago finally found la ive stayed else la quaint charming hotel mexican style mexican charm lovely garden tropical plants central choice air conditioning rates expensive close beachjust little block owners amazing people guest feel home bar attached hotel hub activity expats locals alike gathering evenings drinks conversation la anniversary expected party amazing party free tacos amazing party night happy mexico land enjoying celebrating life la unique awesome return dont hesitate la try respond previous post proof times stayed la recent weeklong stay owners host hundred guests night anniversary party possibly expected undivided attention throughout party accusations assault border please look bulk reviews la love recommend friends

Reviews.Content: travel cities experience destination la provides feel mexico mexican tile floors cement walls bright colors curtains bedsheets little rustic courtyard beautiful bougainvillea bar amazing friendly staff shortage locals steps nightlife shopping restaurants playa hotel location warm summer mattress thin dont mind hotel upgraded suites balcony bucket dropped drink bartender beverages ring bell instant service cool
